idea:
RHINO FORCE SERVICES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED  is providing human resource to individual and business in india for security services, housekeeping services, it services , atm management and disinfecton services.(Covid 19)

Our goal is to enhance security by accelerating the design, development, and deployment of the specifically trained workforce ensuring prevention and protection against security threats. We provide and implement specific solutions that meet or exceed industry standards.

With our three guiding principles “Integrity, Vigilance, Helpfulness” Rhino has protected homes, workplaces, and society.
name: RHINO FORCE SERVICES INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Women Leaders and Achievers are "Not Just Aunties" once they cross their 40th 50th, 60th, 70th, 80th... birthday! 


There are millions of women, who are founts of wisdom and 'killing it' at work and home even as they give back to society.


For eg: Falguni Nayar, a former banker, started Nykaa at age 50! 

Shital Bhatkar, a homemaker, feeds 2000 families of terminally-ill patients outside hospitals every single day, in Mumbai and nearby cities.


And we’re going to share these AMAZING stories on our new digital channel: @Notjustaunty 


What are we exactly?

A channel where you will find interviews of women who excelled at work 'and home'. 

Real Stories of overcoming stereotypes, societal expectations, and under-representation.


Where?

On Youtube, (with powerful capsules on Instagram, Linkedin, Twitter and FB too)


Stay tuned for tonnes of Ideas, Inspiration and Entertainment!


Disclaimer: Views expressed by the participants are their own and the channel does not subscribe to them.
name: NotJustAunty

idea: Shunyaa makes the distribution of perishable products more affordable and accessible for food producers and more profitable for transporters. We aim to be the largest cold chain logistics platform providing nationwide coverage for multiple high growth industries such as cloud kitchens, D2C, FMCG and Pharma.
name: Shunyaa
